## BaseService.getHttpClient() method

Get the Axios instance set on the service. All requests will be made using this instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getHttpClient(): import("axios").AxiosInstance;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

import("axios").AxiosInstance
